
Consider the following statement as truth: {{Ken (born November 28, 1968 in Maibara, Shiga, Japan) is a musician and singer-songwriter, best known as guitarist of the Japanese rock band L'Arc-en-Ciel.}}.
What is the most appropriate relation between {{Ken}} and {{Maibara, Shiga}} from the following options?

{{organization has member}}
{{has sibling}}
{{no relation}}
{{from country}}
{{has parent}}
{{has spouse}}
{{organization leader}}
{{has child}}
{{event year}}
{{has population}}
{{won award}}
{{has genre}}
{{organization has founder}}
{{headquarters}}
{{is member of}}
{{first product}}
{{has occupation}}
{{movie has director}}
{{has author}}
{{starring}}
{{has type}}
{{located in}}
{{birth place}}
{{has education}}

Please choose the most suitable option from the given choices.
    
{{has education}}
